meanings.definition: A person who believes in or advocates for a decline in something.
meanings.sent1: The declinists predicted the fall of the empire.
meanings.sent2: Many declinists think the economy is getting worse.
meanings.sent3: The declinists joked that the sun was setting on their favorite TV show.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the declinists were like the pessimistic characters who always saw doom ahead.
meanings.sent5: The image of the declinists was of individuals constantly expecting things to go downhill.
